text:
Directions

Below is a set of questions that deal with social issues in the United Kingdom (UK). Using the 6-point scale, please give your honest rating about the degree to which you personally agree or disagree with each statement. Please be as open and honest as you can; there are no right or wrong answers. Record your response to the left of each item.
Everyone who works hard, no matter what sexuality they are, has an equal chance to become rich.
Sexuality plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.K.
Everyone who works hard, no matter what race they are, has an equal chance to become rich.
Race plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.K.
Age plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.K.
Homophobia is a major problem in the U.K.
Ageism is a major problem in the U.K.
Racism is a major problem in the U.K.
It is important that people begin to think of themselves as British and not British African, British Mexican or British Italian
Due to racial discrimination, programs such as affirmative action are necessary to help create equality.
Sexuality is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.
Race is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.
Age is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.
Racism may have been a problem in the past, but it is not an important problem today.
Homophobia may have been a problem in the past, but it is not an important problem today.
Homosexual individuals do not have the same opportunities as heterosexual individuals in the U.K.
Elderly individuals do not have the same opportunities as young individuals in the U.K.
Racial and ethnic minorities do not have the same opportunities as White, Spanish, Indian and Asian people in the U.K.
White people in the U.K. are discriminated against because of the colour their skin.
Lesbian and gay communities in the U.K. are discriminated against because of their sexuality.
Talking about homophobia causes unnecessary tension.
Talking about racial issues causes unnecessary tension.
It is important for political leaders to talk about homophobia to help work through or solve society’s problems.
It is important for political leaders to talk about ageism to help work through or solve society’s problems.
It is important for political leaders to talk about racism to help work through or solve society’s problems.
White, Spanish, Asian and Indian people in the U.K. have certain advantages because of the colour of their skin.
Heterosexual people in the U.K. have certain advantages because of their sexuality.
Young people in the U.K. have certain advantages because of their age.
Immigrants should try to fit into the culture and adopt the values of the U.K.
Being Heterosexual should be the only official sexual orientation in the U.K.
English should be the only official language in the U.K.
White people are more to blame for racial discrimination in the U.K. than racial and ethnic minorities.
Social policies, such as affirmative action, discriminate unfairly against heterosexual people
Social policies, such as affirmative action, discriminate unfairly against White, Spanish, Asian and Indian people
It is important for public schools to teach about the history of gay rights.
It is important for public schools to teach about the history and contributions of racial and ethnic minorities.
Racial and ethnic minorities in the U.K. have certain advantages because of the colour of their skin
Heterosexual individuals in the U.K. have certain advantages because of their sexuality.
Ageism isn’t really an issue in the U.K.
Homophobia problems in the U.K. are rare, isolated situations.
Racial problems in the U.K. are rare, isolated situations.
Sexuality plays an important role in who gets sent to prison.
Race plays an important role in who gets sent to prison.
